Introduction

Dasom is a South Korean singer and actress. She is best known as a former member of South Korean girl group Sistar under Starship Entertainment. She has acted in films and television dramas, including Family (2012–2013), Melody of Love (2013–2014) and The Virtual Bride (2015).
